summary:
Led in development of fast paced software teams.
- list
- of
- things
Expedited the synergies of collaborative agile tooling.

- Developed valuation model and wrote initiation of coverage (IoC) report for a NOK 200m market cap Norwegian SME bank
- Rebuilt a valuation model of Norway’s largest bank with scenario analysis on a prospective NOK 11b acquisition of a competitor

- Administered a survey of 1000+ client customers of IT services sector company in collaboration with the client CMO to perform a customer perception analysis
- Led an M&A screening of European IT services providers and identified 21 prospective candidates

- Quantified regulatory impact on future revenues supporting the vendor due diligence (VDD) of a SEK 2b IPO in the chemicals sector
- Built models forecasting global supply and demand for hydrogen and lithium derivatives driven by an increased focus on renewables

- Established partnerships with 100+ coaches and collected 3000+ student leads through a KickoffLabs campaign leveraging Hubspot and Google Analytics
- Raised EUR 200,000 in EU innovation grants for Riga office and assisted in IPO preparations
- Developed a strategic framework for future-proofing Unilever’s capabilities and presented for ~300 employees in collaboration with the Global Finance Excellence Director and Digital Change Lead

- Norway’s largest VC fund focusing on Nordic B2B software companies looking to scale internationally, AUM NOK 1.3B
- Worked closely with the founding team and partners with due diligence processes, fund management, investment strategy, and pipeline optimization

- Third-largest cable TV provider in the US, $11B Market Cap
- Created a data-driven digital strategy and product MVP to increase customer acquisition among millennials with the VP of Strategic Planning and Analysis
- Led a 3-member team conducting investment screening of 98 AI startups in Southeast Asia and presented a recommendation leading to a $640m investment in Singaporean retail AI startup

- Researched and created a market map of the Singaporean VC Ecosystem that was later used by top executives at Silicon Valley Bank and presented to top-tier Silicon Valley VC firms
- Built a data-driven impact investment framework for venture capital and analyzed impact trends
range: San Francisco/Menlo Park, CA, USA: May 2017 - August 2017
